price: Онон гуфтанд: “Оё [сухани] ҳақ бароямон овардаӣ ё шухӣ мекунӣ?”
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا بِٱلۡحَقِّ أَمۡ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱللَّٰعِبِينَ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū aji'tanā bil-ḥaqi am anta mina al-lāʿibīna
